name: Infernal Jam (LD48)
description:
THE GAME

Does every jam feel like a barely controlled fiasco? 

Do you code barely functional stick figure games while everyone else makes fully realized 3D masterpieces? 

Then you may find this journey a little familiar....

HOW TO PLAY

This is a short interactive comic -- sit back and make choices. Easy choices. No pressure.  

When you see the green text on the bottom of the page, click on it to continue.

We’ve done the hard part -- you do the easy part. 

DEV NOTES

Coding: Unity 

Art & Animation: Krita & Tahoma 2D

Music & SFX: Audacity
